* Budget Management

### FAQS

How do I reserve the use of a Township park?

Please visit the Department of Public Works page of the Township website for the request form and more information.

How do I request to purchase Township land?

Complete and submit the Township Land Request Form, located in the Related Resources section of the Lakewood Township Government page of the website.
  
  
Submission instructions are located on the form.

How do I report a street light outage?

If you notice a street light or public area light is out, please complete a report by clicking here: [JCP&Ls website](https://www.firstenergycorp.com/content/customer/service_requests/report-lighting-problem.html.html)

How do I apply for a Marriage License?

Please visit the Registrar/Vital Statistics page of the Township's website. [Click here](https://www.lakewoodnj.gov/department/vital_statistics)

How do I obtain a Birth Certificate?

Please visit the Registrar/Vital Statistics page of the Township's website. [Click here](https://www.lakewoodnj.gov/department/vital_statistics)

How do I obtain a Death Certificate?

Please visit the Registrar/Vital Statistics page of the Township's website. [Click here](https://www.lakewoodnj.gov/department/vital_statistics)

Contact The Lakewood Township Government

 Municipal Building  
Lakewood, NJ 08701

732.364.2500

Hours: 9 AM - 5 PM

**Note:** If this is an OPRA request it must be sent to
the [Township Clerk](https://www.lakewoodnj.gov/department/clerk)
